definitions.definition: A type of elaborate robe especially as worn by someone in power or a religious official.
A liturgical hanging on and around the altar , as well as the cloth hanging from the pulpit and lectern .
A hanging or ornament of a room of state.

main_definition: ( now historical ) A type of elaborate robe especially as worn by someone in power or a religious official.
secondary_definitions: A liturgical hanging on and around the altar , as well as the cloth hanging from the pulpit and lectern .
A hanging or ornament of a room of state.
